qa_multi_document_information_integratio.question: According to the hospitalization records of Knoxville General Hospital and Clearwater General Hospital, what are the ages of patients L. Rogers and J. Alvarez?
qa_multi_document_information_integratio.answer: According to the hospitalization records of Knoxville General Hospital, patient L. Rogers is 56 years old; according to the hospitalization records of Clearwater General Hospital, patient J. Alvarez is 83 years old.

content: Blurry, foggy vision and decreased visual acuity for the past 3 months
Repeated respiratory infections, palpitations, and shortness of breath for 2 months.

qa_multi_document_information_integratio.answer: According to the hospitalization records of Knoxville General Hospital, patient L. Rogers' chief complaint is blurry, foggy vision and decreased visual acuity for the past 3 months; according to the hospitalization records of Clearwater General Hospital, patient J. Alvarez's chief complaint is repeated respiratory infections, palpitations, and shortness of breath for 2 months.

qa_multi_document_information_integratio.answer: According to the hospitalization records of Knoxville General Hospital, patient L. Rogers is a teacher; according to the hospitalization records of Clearwater General Hospital, patient J. Alvarez is retired.

qa_multi_document_information_integratio.answer: According to the hospitalization records of Knoxville General Hospital, patient L. Rogers is married; according to the hospitalization records of Clearwater General Hospital, patient J. Alvarez is widowed.

qa_multi_document_information_integratio.question: According to the hospitalization records of Knoxville General Hospital and Clearwater General Hospital, what are the diagnoses of patients L. Rogers and J. Alvarez?

content: Bilateral Cataract, more pronounced in the right eye

qa_multi_document_information_integratio.answer: According to the hospitalization records of Knoxville General Hospital, patient L. Rogers was diagnosed with bilateral cataract, more pronounced in the right eye; according to the hospitalization records of Clearwater General Hospital, patient J. Alvarez was diagnosed with congenital heart disease (ventricular septal defect).

qa_multi_document_compare.question: According to the hospitalization records of Knoxville General Hospital and Clearwater General Hospital, who was admitted earlier, L. Rogers or J. Alvarez?
qa_multi_document_compare.answer: L. Rogers was admitted on January 6th, and J. Alvarez was admitted on August 21st. L. Rogers was admitted earlier.

qa_multi_document_compare.answer: L. Rogers is 56 years old, and J. Alvarez is 83 years old. J. Alvarez is older.

qa_multi_document_compare.answer: L. Rogers' blood pressure is 120/80 mmHg, and J. Alvarez's blood pressure is 140/85 mmHg. J. Alvarez's blood pressure is higher.
